__e: But two years didn't seem that long.
It's been a while since I read it, so I need to take a look, but some of the details of this body find seem very familiar.
They seemed a little different than the last time I fought them. I mean, look around you.
By all accounts they seemed happy.
We'll splint you up and get you out of here in no time, okay?

Last week, it seemed like things at Justice were finally dying down.
You know, weird, and it seemed like drugs but then you showed me those articles.
It's so strong I've got no fear of putting it on the rails.
I'm worried about when we run out of track and crash into the wall.
